reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: PYM Naisten demokraattisen osallistumisen tuki Timor-Lestessa

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to create local interactive dialogue platforms where workshops and trainings for women will focus on issues surrounding democratic principles citizenship and human rights. Such trainings are particularly called for at the local and district levels in Timor-Leste as the nation seeks to consolidate its democracy. These workshops will provide women at the district level with better understanding of the processes that are taking place in the democratic transition as well as their rights and oblications as Timorese citizens. Such objectives are very much in line with the Timor-Leste's National Strategic Development Plan.
